effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.x_y: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.
